data.text: Very good quality and relaxing independent hotel in the best part of the island sheltered from prevailing winds and with direct access to the beach from the amazing lagoon pool.  The quality of accommodation, food and service are very high and you can see that the staff care about the guest experience.  This hotel benefits from a sister hotel Apollo Beach next door that is included in all inclusive package of the Blue hotel and adds another option for eating with fresh baked pizza and lovely Al fresco dining.  Any negative reviews on here are probably just some disgruntled and overly critical people who had a bad experience or would find anything to complain about but in general this is one of the best all inclusive resorts I have had the pleasure of staying and would come again.  Highly recommended and would return as I know is dependable.
data.title: Excellent quality and value from independent hotel group with great location and direct beach access

data.text:
VERY PLEASANT ATMOSPHERE PLACE
 
Very beautiful Apollo blue Hotel it was a nice place . They are welcoming from thier guest it is free wi - fi and the pool was so so nice at the front beach of faliraki. Pool had a spot water massage at the pool.. greatfful facilities..theres a lounge bar. And restaurant at poolside.. you can go there to buy a foods if you are tired to swim or hungry. Theres so many quality food and drinks to choose for meals..foods are pricey..value for money was ok. Room is very pretty large bedroom with a nice sea view .. is there! Staff is always around at the place to clean room and give a free complimentary instant coffee. Very accomodating staff and hospitality.. all over the place was excellent.
Therefore a great hotel. To stay..

Room 5/5; Value 5/5  Cleanliness 5/5 Service 5/5
data.title: Apollo Blue Hotel"

user_location.name: Francisco I. Madero Municipality, Central Mexico and Gulf Coast

data.text:
My family and me had the pleasure of visiting this great hotel during the summer of 2023.
Despite our initial hiccup â€“ a booking mishap on our end, reserving a garden view room instead of the seaside view that typically includes complimentary airport transportation â€“ the hotel staff showed remarkable responsiveness and understanding. To our surprise, they graciously provided free transfer from airport anyway, demonstrating an amazing dedication to ensuring their guests' satisfaction. This thoughtful gesture significantly increased our overall comfort from the very start. Upon arrival, we were greeted with an unexpected bonus: our rooms were upgraded to ones featuring private garden pool, adding an extra layer of luxury to our stay.
While the accommodations were slightly below the anticipated standard for a 5-star establishment, they still offered a cozy retreat. The minor discrepancy in quality was easily overshadowed by the positive aspects of our upgraded rooms.
The all-inclusive package ensured a vast array of food options for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Even our picky son found plenty of choices for each meal, which was a pleasant surprise. The Ã  la carte dinner and complimentary drinks from the pool bar added a touch of luxury, and the option to use the pizza stand at the sister hotel next door was a convenient and tasty bonus.
The hotel's environment offers a well-balanced blend of relaxation and convenience. With a main pool and a separate one for children, as well as its own part of the beach, we could easily choose where to unwind without the need for extensive travel.
We thoroughly enjoyed the variety of entertainment options, including concerts and different musical performances. These added another layer of enjoyment to the warm evenings, complementing the already great atmosphere created by the hotel's surroundings.
Special mention must be made of the outstanding and friendly staff. Daily small talk and the extra attention given to the kids further enriched our stay. The overall experience at this 5-star all-inclusive hotel was exceptional, largely thanks to the staff's commitment to guest satisfaction and the numerous positive surprises throughout our stay.
We are greatly looking forward to spending time there during the summer 2024 again.
data.title: Perfect vacation for family

data.text: Myself, my partner and our 5 year old stayed here during the October half term, we had not been to Rhodes before and this visit wonâ€™t be our last, the hotel was lovely and clean, the food was good and nothing was to much trouble for any of the staff who were all lovely! We stayed in a suite on the 2nd floor which opened up to a shared pool and amazing views across the hotel and the sea! We canâ€™t wait to come back ðŸ˜Š
data.title: Perfect family holiday!

data.text: A beautiful tranquil hotel with excellent food and friendly service especially Helena and Angelo. A fantastic holiday in a top hotel. The first hotel I've slept without any noise and I've been in quite a few
data.title: Beautiful Rhodes
